mapper.select: SELECT * FROM km_cs_notice AS CN JOIN km_cs_cate AS CC ON CC.cate = CN.cate JOIN km_cs_type AS CT ON CT.type = CN.type ORDER BY rdate DESC, noticeNo DESC LIMIT 0, 5;
SELECT * FROM km_cs_qna AS CQ JOIN km_cs_cate AS CC ON CC.cate = CQ.cate JOIN km_cs_type AS CT ON CT.type = CQ.type ORDER BY rdate DESC, qnaNo DESC LIMIT 0, 5;
SELECT * FROM km_cs_faq AS CF JOIN km_cs_type AS CT ON CF.cate = CT.cate AND CF.type = CT.type WHERE CF.cate = #{cate} ORDER BY CF.type, faqNo DESC LIMIT 0, 10;
SELECT * FROM km_cs_type AS CT JOIN km_cs_cate AS CC ON CT.cate = CC.cate WHERE CT.cate = #{cate};
